name: Space Buddies (Guillaume Brunerie)
description:
Protect your astronaut and go deeper and deeper into space to collect the screws needed to repair your spaceship!

This game is designed to be played on mobile, but could possibly be played with a mouse if needed.

Tap and release to fire, holding down to increase your precision and adjust the direction. Swipe up to use your hand to grab screws and power ups. And if you have the laser, hold down as long as you want!

Credits:

  • Art and animations by Filip Grudziel
  • Programming by Guillaume Brunerie
  • Music and sounds come from a Humble Bundle of music and sound effects
